Name: Average time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and the first occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to occur after SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average duration of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection when followed by SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week compared to when followed directly by SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'

Name: Total time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants where SW-Reviewer Agreed appears at least once
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and SW-Reviewer Declined in cases where no reviewer ultimately agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to the first Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Average time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and SW-Reviewer Selection is now due across all process variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in cases leading to SW-EIC Reject versus SW-EIC Accept
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Minimum time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in variants that include SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Time of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection measured as the interval until the next distinct reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer Unavailable)
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time it takes SW-AE Assign Reviewers to occur after SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in variants where SW-Reviewer No Response eventually appears
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Elapsed time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late in high-delay variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late'

Name: Cycle Time of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection defined as the period from its occurrence until the completion of the first successful reviewer agreement (SW-Reviewer Agreed)
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
